code: import React,{Fragment}from'react';import moment from'moment';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{deleteExperience}from'../../actions/profile';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experience=_ref=>{let{experience,deleteExperience}=_ref;const experiences=experience.map(exp=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:exp.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"hide-sm",children:exp.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[moment(exp.from).format('YYYY/MM/DD')," -",' ',exp.to?moment(exp.to).format('YYYY/MM/DD'):'Now']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteExperience(exp._id),className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete"})})]},exp._id));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"my-2",children:"Experience Credentials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Company"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"hide-sm",children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"hide-sm",children:"Years"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:experiences})]})]});};export default connect(null,{deleteExperience})(Experience);
